comment.author: 김규식
comment.content: I could not find the job in the web site.

post.content:
Systems Consultant – 0200030  

Description
The USI Systems Sales Compensation Team requires additional team members to support a series of initiatives significantly enhancing the existing Agency system. This position reports to the project manager of the Sales Compensation team.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Participate in the architecture, design, development and implementation of enhanced Agency business functionality.
Implement new functionality, enhance existing system functions, further develop the technical architecture, and provide solutions to complex technical and business problems.
Coach/mentor more junior System Analyst staff and provide leadership in the use of design principles and finding new ways to be more efficient.



Qualifications
Essential:

6-8 years of mainframe development experience in addition to architectural and design skills
Extensive experience with Agency systems, COBOL, CAP, DB2, CICS and JCL. Strong mainframe technical, analytical and design skills required
Understand and use design principles effectively
Strong interpersonal skills to work effectively with internal user community and Sales Compensation team members
Ability to understand the customers perspective, but also be able to influence decisions
Ability to mentor/coach staff
Ability to learn and apply new business and technical knowledge quickly and effectively
Good understanding of project management methodologies
Effective use of Manulife's Standard System Development Methodology
Ability to be flexible and adaptable when dealing with changes and work well under pressure

Helpful:

Knowledge of other systems which interact with the Agency systems
Insurance Industry experience

Band: SM
Salary: $70,100.00 - $116,900.00

Please note that if you wish to apply for this position, Human Resources hiring policies (found in the US and Canadian Employee Guides) apply.

  Profile  
  Position Title   Information Technology  
  Location   CA-ON-*Toronto-200 Bloor Street E  
  Organization   US Individual  
  Schedule   Full Time  
     Additional Information  
  Opening   January 18, 2002  
  Closing   February 17, 2002  
  Recruiter   Emma deVries  
  Hiring Manager   John Coro  


Employment Type:   Regular

post.title: manulife에서 MainFrame 경력자를 구하네요...참조하세요
